entry.summary: Intro The terminal, also known as the command line interface (CLI), is a powerful tool that can greatly enhance our experience on macOS. One of the main advantages of using the terminal is that it gives us access to a wide range of powerful command-line tools and utilities. Additionally, we can increase our efficiency and speed of navigation and management of files and directories. The termina...
